Soil Moisture Forcing¶

The forcing dataset is a netCDF file with the variables SOILICE and SOILLIQ on it. The variables are not in the usual lat/lon format (named 4D [1]) but in an indexed format (named 3D [2]).

Obtain 3D from CLM¶

CLM can directly output the needed 3D soil moisture fields.

Example namelist for output:

# daily SM, lat, lon grid:
hist_fincl2 = 'SOILICE', 'SOILLIQ'
# daily SM, column form
hist_fincl3 = 'SOILLIQ','SOILICE'
hist_nhtfrq = 0, -24, -24
hist_mfilt = 1, 365, 365
hist_dov2xy = .true., .true., .false.

Convert 4D to 3D¶

Footnotes

[1]time x level x latitude x longitude
[2]time x level x index
